rows.label: qst201905_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmm... Now that we're searching,
it is surprisingly large.

rows.label: qst201905_msg0002
rows.name:
Tora, where is the
black-feathered fool?

rows.label: qst201905_msg0003
rows.name:
How would Tora know, mo?!
Nopon do not have such
convenient abilities, mo.

rows.label: qst201905_msg0004
rows.name:
What... Then we have no choice but
to rely on memory and ask around.

rows.label: qst201905_msg0005
rows.name: I heard the name Suisui, though.

rows.label: qst201905_msg0007
rows.name:
It seems difficult to search
with only those hints, mo...

rows.label: qst201905_msg0008
rows.name:
We won't know until we try, will
we? Now, let's walk around Goldmund
and question suspicious people.

rows.label: qst201905_msg0009
rows.name: Let's start from the first floor, mo...
